response.original_title: Anime nere: Heinrich Himmler & Adolf Eichmann
response.overview: This documentary is designed to present the lives and activities of Heinrich Himmler (head of the SS - the super police created by Hitler as the main tool of oppression - until 1928) and Adolf Eichmann (head of the Department of Jewish Affairs of the Gestapo from 1941 to 1945 and head of operations in the deportation of 3 million Jews to extermination camps.
response.title: Anime nere: Heinrich Himmler & Adolf Eichmann
